column4: ANyone know a good website for learning to to make the desktop really eye candy like? Mines just the intial install and I'd like to change it up a bit to be fresh to look at
enable desktop effects, go to town :-)
I did that, but I want to see those new things like icon bar at the bottom that mac stole from linux
that's another dock manager.  try googling for linux docks.  maybe try "awn"
